posts.cooked:
Hi everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.35.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here .

Release notes:

  • The new filter icon next to the search box makes it easy to quickly find unread chats, but feel free to take your time deciding whether or not to leave them on read after seeing what they had to say.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.34.0-beta.3…v7.35.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

Thanks for being a beta tester!

New Version: 7.35.0-beta.1

54 new commits since 7.34.0-beta.3:

Show commits

  • v7.35.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Fix useHasWrapped hook [2]

  • Request contact sync before importing backup [3]

  • Refactor force-update updater mode [4]

  • Batch redux conversation changed / added actions [5]

  • Reorder checks in initialization sequence [6]

  • Fully sync before exporting a backup [7]

  • Fix pixelated windows app icon [8]

  • Deprecate Keys.storageService sync field [9]

  • Use websocket for all chat service requests [10]

  • Export/import verified state [11]

  • Update quote behavior in backups [12]

  • Fix download progress reporting for force update [13]

  • Show update UI on backup version mismatch [14]

  • Update mock-server to 10.0.0 to ensure tests use WS chat endpoints [15]

  • Improve windows icon at smaller sizes [16]

  • Update backup media idle state after resuming download [17]

  • Update backup benchmark timing [18]

  • Update call view icons [19]

  • Avoid unnecessary stringification when saving new message [20]

  • Handle calls without callId in backup proto [21]

  • Improve backup export benchmark measurement [22]

  • Filter chats by Unread [23]

  • Release notes for 7.34 [24]

  • Update strings [25]

  • Update DNS fallback [26]

  • Upgrade/remove outdated dependencies [27]

  • Update libsignal to 0.62.0 [28]

  • Handle abort signal in SocketManager [29]

  • Fix pre call info for call links with admin approval [30]

  • Upgrade sass [31]

  • Update to ringrtc 2.48.7 [32]

  • For outgoing 1:1 calls, start ringing on prering status [33]

  • Add toast when import errors [34]

  • Upgrade outdated dependencies [35]

  • Allow empty groupExpirationTimerUpdate.updaterAci in backup import [36]

  • Ignore stdout errors when running from console [37]

  • Update icon assets [38]

  • Upgrade outdated dependencies [39]

  • Upgrade rezip-electron to 2.0.1 [40]

  • Improve handling of expireTimerVersion glare [41]

  • Better handling of failed message migration attempts [42]

  • Update backup integration tests to fcd73d83 [43]

  • Stub out speechEvent callback [44]

  • Fix animated logo spinner [45]

  • Limit Filter by Unread to non production [46]

  • Fix repeated call messages for timestamp updates [47]

  • Re-hydrate signal protocol caches after import [48]

  • Fix react-contextmenu patch [49]

  • Ensure ESC removes quoted reply when drafting [50]

  • Add missing await in storage service code [51]

  • Release notes for 7.35 [52]

  • Update strings [53]

  • 7.35.0-beta.1 [54]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.34.0-beta.3…v7.35.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

At least 67 languages changed since 7.34.0-beta.3:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from “Updated language translations” and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.34.0-beta.3 so far here.

Link to the previous v7.34 desktop beta thread: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.34 release - #11 by Whatnoww

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.34 release

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Textbox does not come into focus after clicking it after having entered an emoji from the emoji selector, deviating from 7.34’s behavior. Makes it confusing.

I’ve also seen this issue where emoji’s are sometimes are more narrow or wider than they should be.

Every emoji in this image seems to have different proportions.

posts.name: Patrick
posts.cooked: I am unable to search for emojis when pulling them up through reaction menu. No results are found

Some error Signal registered again:

image403×551 17.4 KB

Logs

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked:
please provide a debug log

Signal Support

Debug Logs and Crash Reports

We want our messaging and calling features to work seamlessly at all times. Thanks for reaching out to us about the issues you’re experiencing and being willing to provide information that will hel...

posts.name: Jamie Kyle
posts.cooked: What language and search terms are you using? Could you share a debuglog?

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Portrait videos are playing on the left side of Signal for me instead of playing in the center of the window.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.35.0-beta.1/6856dd0891ef5558fd0399c0ff3d248d02fafce65a14601a7f16ecd4fb6da6e8.gz

posts.name: Salt
posts.cooked: Just a heads up for those not in the United States, many employees in the United States have Thursday and Friday off this week for Thanksgiving. Just wanted to let you all know so you don’t think the Signal devs disappeared

Other than the textbox focus issue which I also have, my Signal Desktop just crashed; the window remained open but I couldn’t click on anything inside it, it just froze.

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.35.0-beta.1/d1f677155a8c72264344fc12551885b64349c78d05d0bcf2380ba2706dbbfd34.gz
